items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous show stopper for all sizes!!!!
items.body: Iâ€™ve ordered several dresses from this brand! I was only disappointed on this most recent order because I ordered this dress and another one thatâ€™s a one-shoulder gown with gold flowers. The other dress was an Amazon return and the sequins were uncomfortable because of how it was stitched I want to let you know as a plus size woman that the silver leaves on this dress as well as the other varieties that Iâ€™ve ordered do not scratch or irritate! This dress is going to be a huge showstopper for New Yearâ€™s Eve and a lunar new year celebration that Iâ€™m gonna use for a formal work event later in February as well. Iâ€™m definitely gonna get 2 wonderful uses out of this dress at least. Iâ€™ve never had a dress with this type of fit before with the high collar neck line, which I typically donâ€™t like, but this one felt comfortable and looks gorgeous. I can tell I probably will struggle a little with the arm Dangling sequins a little bit more with this type of fit, but I really donâ€™t think itâ€™s that bad. Itâ€™s a gorgeous dress that is well-made and looks like itâ€™s from a higher end brand. I definitely vouch for these dresses. I normally wear a size 20 and I always order these dresses in a size 3X because formal wear run small and it fits me perfect with plenty of room for dancing and or networking the whole evening away. This brand is always very flattering for all body types. Read more
items.author: Latingirl0012

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very glamorous!
items.body: If you want to be glamorous buy this dress! I am 5'6" 170lbs this dress length goes all the way to my feet. It's very comfortable wearing all night. I got so many compliments, the color is a beautiful emerald green, it's stretchy so it will cover your curves. The material is just the right thickness and is not see through. I am not very busty 36B and it looks amazing, Very nice quality dress for a reasonable price Read more
items.author: Lori Blanchard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and stretchy and beautiful. I am 5'6 and 161lbs and I got an XL and it fits great. It's not too snug and the length is perfect with heals. The quality looks great it's is a good quality of material and it is lined so you cannot see through it. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Evening Bodycon Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Evening Bodycon Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-gold, Blue, Apricot-pattern, Black-2, Apricot, Apricot-leaf Pattern, Blacksrzy-pattern, Light Green-leaf Pattern, Green-leaf Pattern, Black-pattern, Purple, Green-pattern, Green, Blacksilver-pattern. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
